name: Dungeon's Barrage
description: Control an Arcana Magus through the dungeon and try to survive the waves as long as you can! Dungeon's Barrage is a shoot’em up with a feeling of retro games with a fast-paced combat in a closed dungeon filled with enemies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ Processor: Dual Core + Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 2500 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-3220 Processor @ 3.30GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce Gtx 660 Ti DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 300 MB available space
